message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,000 for it. Could we possibly meet somewhere in the middle?
Hi Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your position, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me to consider.  How about we split the difference and settle at $10,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still unable to pay more than $9,000 for the product. Would it be possible to reach an agreement at this price?
